nodes.text: Leslomy Tacema was a female Duros.

Tacema helped run the docking facilities in Mos Eisley. She was friends with Ellors Madak, and like him was an excellent pilot. She approved of all cargo manifests, and was forgiving of minor transgressions.

Leslomy Tacema is an anagram of Stacy Mollema, who also portrayed Ame Llom.
Leslomy Tacema can be seen in the background next to an Aqualish and an Unidentified H'nemthe.
